name: Realistic Universe
description: Grounded in real-world physics, history, and contemporary settings

prompt.base: Realistic universe, contemporary setting, modern world, grounded reality, authentic environment, real-world physics, believable setting
prompt.positive: realistic universe, contemporary setting, modern world, authentic details, real-world physics, believable environment, grounded reality, natural lighting, practical effects, documentary style, photorealistic quality
prompt.negative: fantasy elements, magic, supernatural, sci-fi technology, futuristic, mythical creatures, impossible physics, surreal elements

technical.world_constraints: Bound by real-world laws and limitations

variations.name: Urban Realistic
variations.modifier: city environment, urban setting, metropolitan atmosphere, modern architecture, street-level realism

variations.name: Rural Realistic
variations.modifier: countryside setting, natural environment, rural atmosphere, agricultural landscape, pastoral realism

variations.name: Historical Realistic
variations.modifier: period-accurate setting, historical environment, authentic era details, documented time period

examples: A contemporary urban scene with realistic universe, modern city environment, authentic details
A rural landscape in realistic universe, natural countryside setting, grounded atmosphere
